text: Thryptomene repens is a shrub species in the family Myrtaceae that is endemic to Western Australia. The shrub is found in a small area the Gascoyne region of Western Australia around Shark Bay. ==References== repens Category:Endemic flora of Western Australia Category:Endangered flora of Australia Category:Rosids of Western Australia Category:Plants described in 2014 Category:Taxa named by Malcolm Eric Trudgen Category:Taxa named by Barbara Lynette Rye
title: Thryptomene repens
